Which would you like to do? Walk over to the fireplace, Look at the desk or go to the other room?

card.title: Kitchen
card.text: You enter the Kitchen. Rows of cabinets, most with their doors fallen off. A large stove and oven on one side and on the other side several sinks with pots, pans and plates scattered about. The rain has started to fall heavier now. Lightning flashes and the roll of thunder shakes the pans on the countertops. There is a door that looks to lead to the basement, and there is a entry to the next room. You can choose to "go to the basement", "Look in the oven", or "the next room".

card.title: Oven

You hear the loud squeak of several large rats as they scurry out of the oven opening and run across your feet. You are glad you are not eating in this kitchen. Say "Go back."

card.title: Eat Dinner
card.text: You sit down at the head of the table to rest. A place setting with tarnished plates an silverware are laid out in front of you like a dinner party for the dead. You hear the faint soothing sound of violin music in the distance and you suddenly feel dizzy, like you are about to black out. A sudden flash of lightning and explosion of thunder shake you out of the trance and you jump to your feet. Say "go back".
